sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ_SEC_STAFF_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_STAFF ( STAFF_ID , LOGIN_NAME , DEPARTMENT_ID , REAL_NAME , PASSWORD , STATUS , SEX , TELEPHONE , MOBILE , EMAIL , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , EXPIRE_DATE , PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, LOCK_DATE , CITY_ID , LAST_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES(#staffId#, #loginName#, #departmentId#, #realName#, #password#, #status#, #sex#, #telephone:VARCHAR#, #mobile#, #email:VARCHAR#, #createUser#, SYSDATE, #expireDate:DATE#, #passwordExpireDate:DATE#, #lockDate:DATE#, #cityId#, #lastUpdateDate:DATE#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET LOGIN_NAME = #loginName#, DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#, REAL_NAME = #realName#, STATUS = #status#, SEX = #sex#, TELEPHONE = #telephone:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #mobile#, EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate#, EXPIRE_DATE = #expireDate:DATE#, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE = #passwordExpireDate:DATE#, LOCK_DATE = #lockDate:TIMESTAMP#, CITY_ID = #cityId#, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = #status# WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = #status# WHERE STAFF_ID IN ($staffIds$)
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'EXPIRED', LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SYSDATE > EXPIRE_DATE
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'PASSWORD_EXPIRED', LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SYSDATE > PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'INITIAL', LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STATUS = 'AUTO_LOCKED' AND LOCK_DATE < #value#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'DELETED' WHERE STAFF_ID = #value#
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'DELETED', DEPARTMENT_ID = null WHERE STAFF_ID = #value#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STAFF_ID = #value#
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE LOGIN_NAME = #value# AND STATUS != 'DELETED'

SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID = ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE
ROLE_ID = #roleId#
ROLE_KEY = #roleKey#
ROLE_NAME = #roleName#
) )

SELECT count(1) FROM SEC_STAFF
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#departmentId#)
DEPARTMENT_ID in ($dynamicFields.departmentIds$)
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain in ($department.dynamicFields.domains$ ))
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
STAFF_ID IN ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)
((last_update_date > sysdate - $dynamicFields.beforeDays$) or (status = 'INITIAL' and CREATE_DATE > sysdate - $dynamicFields.beforeDays$))

select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#departmentId#)
DEPARTMENT_ID in ($dynamicFields.departmentIds$)
STAFF_ID in ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain in ($department.dynamicFields.domains$ ))
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
((last_update_date > sysdate - $dynamicFields.beforeDays$) or (status = 'INITIAL' and CREATE_DATE > sysdate - $dynamicFields.beforeDays$))
NLSSORT(REAL_NAME,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
$sort$
$order$
) t where rownum <= #end# ) where rn >= #start#
select * from ( SELECT * FROM SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID=#staffId# AND LOGIN_FLAG = #loginFlag# ORDER BY LOGIN_TIME DESC ) temp where rownum=1
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE LOGIN_NAME = #value#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_STAFF_EXTEND_PROPERTY ( STAFF_ID , PROPERTY , VALUE ) VALUES(#id# , #property# , #value# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF_EXTEND_PROPERTY WHERE STAFF_ID = #value#
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF_EXTEND_PROPERTY,basic_tmp_id WHERE STAFF_ID = id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE ( STAFF_ID , DEPARTMENT_ID , ROLE_ID ) VALUES (#staffId# , #departmentId# , #roleId# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#
STAFF_ID = trim(#staffId#)
ROLE_ID = trim(#roleId#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE SELECT #staffId#, #departmentId# , ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_KEY = #roleKey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LOGIN_TIME FROM (SELECT LOGIN_TIME, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT LOGIN_TIME FROM SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId# AND LOGIN_FLAG IN (#loginFlag#) ORDER BY LOGIN_TIME DESC) ) WHERE RNUM = 2
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY ( STAFF_ID , LOGIN_TIME , LOGIN_FLAG, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES (#staffId# , SYSDATE , #loginFlag# ,#description:VARCHAR#)
DELETE SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId# AND LOGIN_TIME < #loginTime#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM SEC_PASSWORD_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #value# ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_PASSWORD_HISTORY ( STAFF_ID , PASSWORD , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (#staffId# , #password# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SEC_PASSWORD_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId# AND UPDATE_DATE < #updateDate#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET PASSWORD = #password#, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE = #passwordExpireDate:DATE#, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, STATUS = #status# WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT STAFF.* FROM SEC_STAFF STAFF WHERE STAFF.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId# AND STAFF.STATUS != 'DELETED' ORDER BY NLSSORT(REAL_NAME,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEC_STAFF STAFF WHERE STAFF.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId# AND STAFF.STATUS != 'DELETED'
SELECT STAFF.* FROM SEC_STAFF STAFF, SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE SDR WHERE STAFF.STAFF_ID = SDR.STAFF_ID AND SDR.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId# AND SDR.ROLE_ID = #roleId# AND STAFF.STATUS != 'DELETED'
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID = ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_KEY = #roleKey# ) )

SELECT y.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, t.* FROM SEC_STAFF t WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT distinct ROLE_ID FROM sec_role_resource_operation role, sec_operation operation, sec_resources res WHERE role.RESOURCE_ID = operation.RESOURCE_ID AND role.OPERATION_KEY = operation.OPERATION_KEY AND res.RESOURCE_ID = operation.RESOURCE_ID AND res.RESOURCE_KEY = #resourceKey# AND operation.OPERATION_KEY = #operationKey# ) )
rownum <= #end#
) y
rnum >= #start#

SELECT count(1) FROM SEC_STAFF t WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT distinct ROLE_ID FROM sec_role_resource_operation role, sec_operation operation, sec_resources res WHERE role.RESOURCE_ID = operation.RESOURCE_ID AND role.OPERATION_KEY = operation.OPERATION_KEY AND res.RESOURCE_ID = operation.RESOURCE_ID AND res.RESOURCE_KEY = #resourceKey# AND operation.OPERATION_KEY = #operationKey# ) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #loginHistory.staffId#
LOGIN_TIME > #loginTime#
ORDER BY LOGIN_TIME DESC

select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( SELECT * FROM SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
LOGIN_TIME > #loginTime#
ORDER BY LOGIN_TIME DESC
) t where rownum <= #end# ) where rn >= #start#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%'
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#dynamicFields.departmentId#)

select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND LOGIN_NAME like '%'||Trim(#dynamicFields.keyword#)||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||Trim(#dynamicFields.keyword#)||'%'
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#dynamicFields.departmentId#)
$sort$
$order$
) t where rownum <= #end# ) where rn >= #start#

SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT ROLE_ID FROM sec_role_resource_operation WHERE RESOURCE_ID=#resourceId#) ) )

SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF_ID IN ( SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT ROLE_ID FROM sec_role_resource_operation a,sec_resources b WHERE a.resource_id=b.resource_id and RESOURCE_KEY=#resourceKey#) ) )

select rnum, y.* from ( select x.*, rownum rnum from (
SELECT /*+ index(HIS IDX_SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY) */ STAFF.STAFF_ID as STAFF_ID, STAFF.LOGIN_NAME as LOGIN_NAME, STAFF.DEPARTMENT_ID as DEPARTMENT_ID, STAFF.REAL_NAME as REAL_NAME, STAFF.PASSWORD as PASSWORD, STAFF.STATUS as STATUS, STAFF.SEX as SEX, STAFF.TELEPHONE as TELEPHONE, STAFF.MOBILE as MOBILE, STAFF.EMAIL as EMAIL, STAFF.CREATE_USER as CREATE_USER, STAFF.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, STAFF.EXPIRE_DATE as EXPIRE_DATE, STAFF.PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE as PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, STAFF.LOCK_DATE as LOCK_DATE, STAFF.LAST_UPDATE_DATE as LAST_UPDATE_DATE, STAFF.CITY_ID as CITY_ID, HIS.LOGIN_FLAG as LOGIN_FLAG, HIS.LOGIN_TIME as LOGIN_TIME, DEP.DOMAIN as DOMAIN FROM SEC_STAFF STAFF,SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY HIS,SEC_DEPARTMENT DEP WHERE STAFF.STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF.STAFF_ID = HIS.STAFF_ID AND STAFF.DEPARTMENT_ID = DEP.DEPARTMENT_ID
STAFF.LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
DEP.DOMAIN = #department.domain#
HIS.LOGIN_FLAG IN ('LOGOUT','TIMEOUT')
HIS.LOGIN_FLAG IN (#loginHistory.loginFlag#)
HIS.LOGIN_TIME = #loginHistory.loginTime#
HIS.LOGIN_TIME >= to_date(#dynamicFields.benginTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
HIS.LOGIN_TIME <= to_date(#dynamicFields.endTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
$sort$
$order$
) x where rownum <= #end# ) y where rnum >= #start#

SELECT /*+ index(HIS IDX_SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY) */ COUNT(*) FROM SEC_STAFF STAFF,SEC_LOGIN_HISTORY HIS,SEC_DEPARTMENT DEP WHERE STAFF.STATUS != 'DELETED' AND STAFF.STAFF_ID = HIS.STAFF_ID AND STAFF.DEPARTMENT_ID = DEP.DEPARTMENT_ID
STAFF.LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
DEP.DOMAIN = #department.domain#
HIS.LOGIN_FLAG IN ('LOGOUT','TIMEOUT')
HIS.LOGIN_FLAG IN (#loginHistory.loginFlag#)
HIS.LOGIN_TIME = #loginHistory.loginTime#
HIS.LOGIN_TIME >= to_date(#dynamicFields.benginTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
HIS.LOGIN_TIME <= to_date(#dynamicFields.endTime#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND (EXPIRE_DATE>SYSDATE-1) AND EXPIRE_DATE <= (SYSDATE + #daysTobeExpired# + 1)
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND trunc(SYSDATE) > nvl(trunc(EXPIRE_DATE),SYSDATE+1)
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND trunc(SYSDATE)> trunc(PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE)
SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF WHERE STATUS='AUTO_LOCKED' AND LOCK_DATE <= (SYSDATE-#beforeHour#/24)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'EXPIRED', LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
UPDATE SEC_STAFF SET STATUS = 'PASSWORD_EXPIRED', LAST_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STAFF_ID = #staffId#
sqlMap.select: select staff_id staffId,department_id departmentId,role_id roleId from sec_staff_department_role
SELECT STAFF_ID STAFFID,DEPARTMENT_ID DEPARTMENTID,ROLE_ID ROLEID FROM SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID = #value#

SELECT count(1) FROM SEC_STAFF,basic_tmp_id where staff_id = id
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#departmentId#)
DEPARTMENT_ID in ($dynamicFields.departmentIds$)
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
STAFF_ID IN ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)

select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( SELECT * FROM SEC_STAFF, basic_tmp_id where staff_id = id
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
DEPARTMENT_ID = trim(#departmentId#)
DEPARTMENT_ID in ($dynamicFields.departmentIds$)
STAFF_ID in ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)
DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
t.EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
NLSSORT(REAL_NAME,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
$sort$
$order$
) t where rownum <= #end# ) where rn >= #start#

SELECT count(1) FROM SEC_STAFF t
,(select department_id,department_name from sec_department connect by prior department_id=parent_id start with department_id=#departmentId#) d
,sec_department d
where t.department_id = d.department_id

REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
t.EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
STAFF_ID IN ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)

,(select department_id,department_name from sec_department connect by prior department_id=parent_id start with department_id=#departmentId#) d
,sec_department d
where t.department_id = d.department_id

$sort$

select count(1) FROM SEC_STAFF t where STATUS != 'DELETED'
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
t.DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
STAFF_ID in ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
department_id = #departmentId#
t.staff_id in ( select distinct s.staff_id from (select distinct staff_id, c.resource_id, b.operation_key from sec_staff_department_role a, sec_role_resource_operation b, sec_resources c where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.resource_id = c.resource_id and c.resource_key in ($dynamicFields.resourceKeys$)) s
group by s.staff_id, s.resource_id having count(1) = (select count(1) from sec_operation k where k.resource_id = s.resource_id)
)

select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( SELECT t.* FROM SEC_STAFF t where STATUS != 'DELETED'
LOGIN_NAME like '%'||trim(#loginName#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%' OR REAL_NAME like '%'||#dynamicFields.keyword#||'%')
t.DEPARTMENT_ID in (select department_id from sec_department where domain=#department.domain# )
STAFF_ID in ($dynamicFields.staffIds$)
REAL_NAME like '%'||trim(#realName#)||'%'
STATUS = #status#
EMAIL = #email#
MOBILE = #mobile#
TELEPHONE = #telephone#
SEX = #sex#
CITY_ID = #cityId#
department_id = #departmentId#
t.staff_id in ( select distinct s.staff_id from (select distinct staff_id, c.resource_id, b.operation_key from sec_staff_department_role a, sec_role_resource_operation b, sec_resources c where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.resource_id = c.resource_id and c.resource_key in ($dynamicFields.resourceKeys$)) s
group by s.staff_id, s.resource_id having count(1) = (select count(1) from sec_operation k where k.resource_id = s.resource_id)
)
NLSSORT(REAL_NAME,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
$sort$
$order$
) t where rownum <= #end# ) where rn >= #start#
